name: tidy UP
description:
In this fast-paced arcade game you have to clear up the mess in 20 seconds. Simply swipe the rubbish into the correct bin to clear up the room! Be careful though, putting the wrong colour rubbish in a bin just makes more rubbish. Can you clear the room before the timer expires?

From concept to fully tested game in 3 hours using ONLY Corona SDK... no fancy graphics, no libraries, no plugins, just 200 lines of pure Lua code!

This entry is for the Corona 4 hour Jam April 2017.

Credits: music sourced from www.freesoundfx.co.uk

Update: uploaded a win32 build with increased time (the game is designed for touch and is not as slick with a mouse)
